name: Hush Little Lily
description:
Hush little Lily, don't say a word~

Lily is getting a mockingbird~

Ah! H-hello there! My name is Lily! Nice to meet you! Lily will tell you a little secrettt.... Lily loves flowers! And Lily hates... monsters.

One day, the monster put Lily inside this small dark room. Lily can hear the monster laughing.... Is it going to eat Lily? 

The monster said that it wants to play a game with Lily.  Hide and Seek. But Lily doesn't want to play with the monster. Lily really doesn't want to....

There are many many rooms here, but Lily doesn't know where to go.... Lily is lost... Lily can touch and look at the objects but what can Lily do with them? Do you find them interesting? 

*gasp* Lily hear the monster coming! Quick! Hide!

Daddy....Mommy... Where are you? Lily hates it here. Want to go home.... Lily doesn't want to die.....

But... you'll help me, right? With you, Lily won't be so lonely anymore. Please.... stay with Lily. Pinky promise?

WARNING: BLOOD. DEATH. BONES. JUMPSCARES.

Art/Programming/UI: ChaniMK (https://twitter.com/ChaniMK_VN)

Writing: OrlonWrites (https://twitter.com/OrlonWrites)

Music: Alina Pisleaga (https://mobile.twitter.com/BeautyOMusic), DovaSyndrome (https://dova-s.jp/)

Sound Effects: Zapsplat (https://www.zapsplat.com/), Unair Online, Sound Effects Database

(A point and click visual novel made for the Spooktober Jam in a month by 2 people.)
